```
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
    hexa20 := 0x14 //Equivalent to 20 in decimal
    output := 10 + hexa20
    fmt.Println(output)
}
```

```
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
    octa20 := 024 //Equivalent to 20 in decimal
    output := 10 + octa20
    fmt.Println(output)
}
```

```
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
    hexa20 := 0x14 //Equivalent to 20 in decimal

    octa20 := 024 //Equivalent to 20 in decimal

    output := 10 + hexa20 + octa20
    fmt.Println(output)
}
```
